Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "After a while, Commandant and I have gotten used to regular drills in Babylonia's simulated training environments."}
{3: "Though I longed for the battlefield, I couldn't step foot on it, as long as Gray Raven remained short-handed."}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'Hey, if it isn\'t "top gun" over there.'}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'Just hanging out, 【kuroname】?'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: "What more do you expect from HQ's number one sweetheart? I bet that Construct's just here for show, our toppa-the-class is just waiting on that promotion to Command Central."}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'Gotta say, I do envy these internal promotions. Who else would have the privilege of getting an undermanned team and cheating their way out of deployment?'}
{1: 'As a subordinate, I kept my cool and held my tongue, just as Commandant did.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But I could not shake the fact that this happened because Commandant chose me.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Every time I heard of these rumors, I would ask Commandant why I was chosen instead of the countless teams, ready and willing to fight.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Commandant became top of the class fair and square. People will know that Commandant's abilities are above reproach, if only we can be deployed...", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Because of this, I toyed with the idea of requesting a re-pairing.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But every time I brought it up, Commandant would respond the same way, dispelling the notion.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "We're fine the way we are.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'As Commandant said it, over and over, I felt the germination of something I\'d once called "emotions" long ago.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Feeling in person the "selflessness" of Commandant\'s actions, I silenced my own rebukes.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'To be sure, my interactions with Commandant reawakened the emotions within me.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'For Constructs, emotions were part of the package. Being human once, we understood the meaning of the word, the value of it.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'But it was because of Commandant that I re-learned these emotions. To borrow a word frequently used among Constructs, I "rebooted".', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The occasional gift, proffered without cause, taught me joy, something I had once neglected as tangential to the mission at hand.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'Gradually, I learned that the gifts were not of reward, or compensation, but simply given.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'I felt my heart leap each time I received something from Commandant that, by all accounts, I did not own or deserve.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Joy. That was what I felt. Receiving a gift always makes me feel like I owed Commandant something, to which the same answer always came.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Just smile.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'It was... a difficult command to carry out.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "And then I learned of sadness as the accusations grew. I kept my cool as always, stopping myself from jumping to Commandant's defense.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'But wherever I turned, those whispers would still reach me and trigger undiagnosed processes in my M.I.N.D..', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "That was sadness. Not for myself, but for others, for Commandant, because I could not bear the slander against Commandant's name.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "So I kept my blade sharp, not for the prospect of showing my skill, but for the need to prove that of my Commandant's.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "And then, I learned the way Commandant thought, observed how tactics and strategy formed in Commandant's movements.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Though our interactions will always be between human and machine, I still held to the hope that I can grow closer to Commandant, and become the best.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '—And thus, I learned anger.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory52.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "You won't chicken out, will you, Lucia?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What... what is this?', 4: '2'}

{3: "On one of Commandant's rest days, I was summoned to a training room by an unpaired team of Constructs. When I arrived, I saw that they had both their weapons and mine, along with a wager—with Commandant as the stakes."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Let me guess... If I lose, I hand over the commandant. Correct?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "After all, we are fully staffed and ready to deploy, whereas with you, I'm afraid you'll never...", 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'What?!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Without hesitation, I went on the offensive against the Constructs. In my mind, battle was joined the moment weapons were drawn.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Coward! Jumping the gun just to win!?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The rest only got into formation after one of them already went down, readying their weapons.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Three against one? You're the real cowards.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct B', 3: 'Tch... these are basic tactics, our team against yours. Attack!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct C', 3: 'Yep!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'I had no interest in contests of skill. Victories in training rooms mean little to nothing.'}
{3: 'But not when Commandant was at stake.'}
{3: 'In that moment, I realized with absolute clarity that I resented the idea of Commandant leaving me, and loathed the prospect of anyone placing stakes on our separation.'}
{3: "Because of that, I picked up the fallen Construct's blade, and charged for break in their formation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Throw everything you've got at me. Commandant... is mine!", 4: '2'}
